div.data-alt: Township of Union Public Schools administration building

div.p: A partner with the home and community.
A positive learning experience in a historical neighborhood setting.
Motivating students to want to learn for the rest of their lives.
Inspiring excellence and developing responsible, empowered leaders.
Committed to building strong bonds between home and school.
A positive culture and environment conducive to the best learning possible.
Together we know, together we grow!

div.span: Students eligible for Free/Reduced meals attending any Township of Union Public School ...

Grab & Go Breakfast & Lunch will be available for pick up Monday - Friday at Union High School (main entrance), Jefferson/Central 5 (main entrance), Franklin Elementary (playground parking lot) and Washington Elementary (teacher's parking lot).
No matter which school you attend, families

who receive free/reduced meals are encouraged to come to any of the above buildings and pick up breakfast and lunch anytime between 10 am and 12:30 pm. Upon request, you may now pick up up to 5 meals at a time. Please be sure to bring a bag transport the meals home in
If you have any questions or concerns,
If your circumstances have changed, please apply for free/reduced lunch by going to www.myschoolapps.com

img.alt: Code of Conduct and Core Values
township of union education foundation inc

strong.span: The mission of the Township of Union Public Schools is to build on the foundations of honesty, excellence, integrity, strong family, and community partnerships. We promote a supportive learning environment where all students are challenged, inspired, empowered, and respected as diverse learners. Through cultivation of students' intellectual curiosity, skills and knowledge, our students can achieve academically and socially as well as contribute as responsible and productive citizens of our global community.
